name: Stanley Black & Decker, Inc.
description: Stanley Black & Decker, Inc. is a global leader in tools and storage, industrial, and security solutions. Founded in 1843, the company is headquartered in New Britain, Connecticut, and operates in more than 60 countries worldwide. Stanley Black & Decker is renowned for its innovative products, including power tools, hand tools, and storage solutions for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. The company has a rich history of innovation, launching iconic brands such as Stanley, DeWALT, Craftsman, and Black & Decker. In addition to tools, the company also offers advanced security solutions and industrial products, including fastening systems and hydraulic tools. Stanley Black & Decker is committed to sustainability and corporate responsibility, focusing on reducing its environmental impact and improving the communities in which it operates. With a strong emphasis on research and development, the company continues to push the boundaries of technology in the tools and storage industry, enhancing productivity and safety for its customers. Stanley Black & Decker's mission is to empower those who make the world by providing the best tools, products, and service, ensuring their customers can achieve their goals.
